website_summaries.verdict: Studs on the base of this eight-foot beam give it a touch of style, and you can purchase additional beams to lengthen it as her skills advance.
pros: Solid wood core for stability and security
Beam portion covered in synthetic suede to imitate competition beams
Comes with two studded base plates
Beam fits into bases and attaches with a strong hook-and-loop system
Can purchase additional beams to lengthen
cons: Heavy for a gymnast to move, but that's because it's so sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but super heavy
customer_reviews.text: This beam is super nice quality -- very sturdy beam and quality suede. However, it's super heavy! I purchased this for my daughter's birthday to replace a smaller fold-up beam. This beam really needs to be in a permanent "home." Because of it's weight, it's not the type of thing a 12-year-old can easily pick up and move from room to room to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Grettmom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Packaged nicely It came with well written instructions There is a Velcro at one and in case you wanted to buy another balance beam to extend it so it would attach to be even longer. Highly recommend !! I would purchase again I did not find any staples sticking out or any sharp area sticking out as I have read and other reviews. It was smooth all the way round
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Tumbl Trak has great quality. Couldn't beat this price. Cheaper on Amazon than going direct with company.
customer_reviews.author: Stuck in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balance beam for home use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for our limited space. The whole family is enjoying using it. Purchased a 5ft x 10ft Tumbl Trak mat to go along with the balance beam, perfect combination. My daughter is constantly practicing. Highly recommend both products. No need to get the extra beam risers, the included supports are adequate for home use.
customer_reviews.author: LB in IL

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money!! We bought this for our daughter who is in her 2nd year of gymnastics. She loves it! It’s very well constructed, sturdy and will last for many years
customer_reviews.author: C Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this beam to any level of gymnast to practice ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old is a competitive gymnast and this beam has helped her get that extra practice at home! She loves it and looks forward to practicing on it every opportunity she can! It is stable, strong, and comparable to the balance beam she has at her gym. Would recommend this beam to any level of gymnast to practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All my kids love this beam. Heavy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: 4kidsnfarming

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this beam is perfect. It hold plenty of weight and looks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this beam is perfect. It hold plenty of weight and looks and feels like the high beams in the gym. I will be getting another one soon to attach so my girl can work on her flight series. This beam is very sturdy and is just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Turner

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! The beam did come with some animal footprints ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The beam did come with some animal footprints on the side when we opened it, but otherwise product was as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and low to the ground. My girls love it
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: sturdy. daughter was thrilled when this arrived for her ...
customer_reviews.text: sturdy. daughter was thrilled when this arrived for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Expensive, but worthwhile. Daughter uses it only when I threaten to sell it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Cinco de Mayo

customer_reviews.title: ... brought this for my 9-year-old and it is a wonderful practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for my 9-year-old and it is a wonderful practice tool! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter loves this beam! It is sturdy and not too difficult to move around. I recommend a mat for underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Weiss

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality and products from tumbl track
customer_reviews.text: Had a complication with the shipment, during the holiday season. Was able to handle with Amazon costumer service to get replacement of missing part. For me it was worth the wait and my daughter loves it. I love the quality, it's the addition to the handstand mat I got earlier for her bday the quality is great worth the extra $ It is perfect for practicing at home
customer_reviews.author: Jewelaua

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice beam! Pricey but worth it! Kids have ad lots of fun. Solid and not tipy.
customer_reviews.author: kfam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This beam is great for our girls. Very sturdy and we have had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the beam!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love using the beam at home. It is very sturdy and does not slide around on the floor. Kids love practicing on the beam and have found that their dolls like gymnastics too. :) It is great to have something like this at home, because it has made them more confident on the big beam in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great for us and looking forward to adding another section as she grows
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The beam was exactly as described. Great quality, solid, worth the price. The beam arrived very quickly in two boxes. One for beam, another for legs. My daughter is on it for hours every day, her gymnastics teacher has noticed a difference in her skills.
customer_reviews.author: IzzyB

customer_reviews.title: Great beam
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fantastic purchase for our aspiring gymnast! The beam is solid and well made. The Velcro keeps it from shifting. Delivery was fast. After shopping around online for over a month-I'm convinced we got the best deal,
customer_reviews.author: just.a.reader

customer_reviews.title: Good strong item
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and sturdy, does not wobble. We are very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnakb

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and so does my daughter :)
customer_reviews.text: Great product - this brand is amazing and the seller was very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Lamosa

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for aspiring gymnast
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is on it constantly. Being off the ground adds stability and realism. We'll probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R Brown

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to set up and a good night
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bar for my 8 year old daughter, it was easy to set up and a good night, we also bought the risers and are using them. The bar is sturdy and of good quality and my daughter is able to practice all of her stunts.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Baresh

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beginner or advanced! Excellent quality and no sweat to unpackage/set up. 😜
customer_reviews.author: busy mama

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to all
customer_reviews.text: The item was just as described. I would recommend it to all. My grand daughter has not stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: joe vincent

customer_reviews.title: Only base ships! No beam!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Only base ships! Happened twice to me!
customer_reviews.author: michael hennigan jr

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: It was my daughters Christmas wish. She absolutely loves it. It is real suede and the purple legs velcro to The rug. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sonya

product_meta.title: Tumbl Trak Brianna Balance Beam, Suede
feature_bullets: ✅IMPECCABLE CRAFTSMANSHIP - When you’re looking for a beam that has style and the best craftsmanship on the market; look no further! Each Tumbl Trak Brianna Beam has been carefully designed to provide a high quality, stylish piece of equipment.

✅SOLID WOOD CORE - Tumbl Trak Brianna Beams have a solid wood core to ensure stability and security when training. The beam portion is covered in a high quality synthetic suede to give it that competition feel.

✅STYLISH AND STABLE BASE - Each Tumbl Trak Brianna Beam comes with 2 stylish studded and stable base pieces. The beam fits tightly into the bases and is attached with a strong hook and loop velcro to provide additional stability.

✅EXTEND YOUR BEAM - Brianna Beams have the ability to be connected together to create a longer surface. The end of the beam has velcro flaps and an opening for a wooden dowel to connect 2 or more beams together!

✅WE KNOW GYMNASTICS - When you purchase a product from Tumbl Trak, you know that you’re getting a TRUE gymnastics product. Coaches, former gymnasts, and industry experts make up the our staff ensuring you get the best product for your athlete.
